componentDescription: Displays an alert with an icon, title, and additional message.

icon.description: Optional icon element that can be displayed in the Alert component.

title.description: The title of the Alert. This property is mandatory and will display as the Alert's main header text.

description.description: An additional description or message that will be displayed below the title in the Alert component.

variant.description: Optional variant property to specify the type of Alert, which may alter its color or style.

styles.description: Optional styles property to provide custom styling to the Alert component.
